arts.ttl: Liverpool Set for a Shocking Battle as PSG Are Ready to Stand Toe-to-Toe, per Pundit
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain rolled past LOSC Lille with a commanding 4-1 win Saturday night at the Parc des Princes, sealing the victory with a dominant first half in which they scored all four goals. PSG struck early, with Bradley Barcola opening the scoring in the sixth minute. Barcola set up Ousmane Dembele for a curling shot […] The post Liverpool Set for a Shocking Battle as PSG Are Ready to Stand Toe-to-Toe, per Pundit appeared first on PSG Talk.

arts.ttl: PSG sends Liverpool warning ahead of Champions League clash
arts.sum: The Asturian coach made it clear there is “no fear” within his squad ahead of facing Liverpool, adding that PSG is currently one of the best teams in Europe . When you think of all the chances we created, plus scoring four goals against a team like Lille — one of the best sides in the Champions League — reducing them to almost nothing is incredibly difficult, and it shows where we’re at.

arts.ttl: Barcelona Plot Move for €180M-Rated Newcastle Star as Surprising Claim Shakes PSG, Liverpool Pursuit
arts.sum: The winter transfer window has closed, and for now, Alexander Isak remains with Newcastle United. There wasn’t much talk of a move this winter, but expect several clubs to revisit the possibility in the summer. arts.ttl: Aston Villa Face Unexpected Dilemma as Real Sociedad Pursue €20M-Rated PSG Loanee
arts.sum: Marco Asensio is excelling on loan at Aston Villa, scoring a brace in their FA Cup win over Cardiff City on Friday night. Moreover, he’s scored a brace in two of his last three matches for the Premier League side. arts.ttl: PSG blows Lille away 4-1 to warm up for Liverpool in Champions League
arts.sum: Khvicha Kvaratskhelia watched the goals from the substitutes’ bench as PSG coach Luis Enrique rested the Georgia star ahead of Liverpool’s visit in the Champions League. Bradley Barcola opened the scoring in the sixth minute on a rebound after Lille goalkeeper Lucas Chevalier saved Ousmane Dembelé’s initial effort.
